body.p:
Bedford Kentucky
Oct 6 1865
To P U, Major Esq
Sir
I enclose to you a petition of W L Johnson for pardon from the Governor for a fine long time ago -- you can hand it to the Governor, oor if you dont like to do that get the proper one to do so
Your old friend Thos Jones is interested in it, and he wishes you to attend to it for his benefit, and he will reciprocate when opportunity offers
You see to it and Send the remission to my address at this place.
you Enclosed ^you^ have the two Dollars to pay at Frankfort the fee to the proper officer
